00025 #ifndef __TextureFont_H__
00026 #define __TextureFont_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 // Hack to avoid needing to include the freetype
00031 // headers in every client build
00032 struct FT_LibraryRec_;
00033 struct FT_FaceRec_;
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037     class _OgreExport TextureFont
00038     {
00039     public:
00040         typedef std::map< String, std::map< String, TextureFont * > > TextureFontMap;
00041 
00042     protected:
00043         static FT_LibraryRec_ **ms_pLibrary;    
00044         static TextureFontMap ms_mapFonts;
00045 
00046         FT_FaceRec_ **m_pFace;
00047         static unsigned ms_uNumFonts;
00048 
00049     public:
00050         TextureFont();
00051         TextureFont( const String& strFontFile );
00052         
00053         void loadFromFile( const String& strFontFile );
00054         
00055         virtual ~TextureFont(); 
00056 
00057         void createTexture( 
00058             const String& strTexName, const String& strString, 
00059             unsigned uTexX, unsigned uTexY, 
00060             unsigned uFontX = 600, unsigned uFontY = 0,
00061             unsigned uFontResX = 72, unsigned uFontResY = 0, 
00062             unsigned uStartX = 1, unsigned uStartY = 1 );   
00063 
00064         void createAlphaMask(
00065             const String& strTexName, const String& strString,
00066             unsigned uTexX, unsigned uTexY,
00067             byte cRed, byte cGreen, byte cBlue,
00068             unsigned uFontX = 600, unsigned uFontY = 0,
00069             unsigned uFontResX = 72, unsigned uFontResY = 0,
00070             unsigned uStartX = 1, unsigned uStartY = 1 );
00071 
00072         static const TextureFontMap& getColl()
00073         {
00074             return ms_mapFonts;
00075         }
00076     };
00077 
00078 } //namespace
00079 
00080 #endif
